definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: Normally, bronchial breath sounds are sometimes heard over the manubrium .
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，支氣管的呼吸聲有時能在柄狀體處被聽到。

sentences.english: Usually, only pubescent or adult males are able to grow beards.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，只有青春期的或者成年男子才能長鬍子。

sentences.english: In general, the associated service specification is published (as metadata) as well.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，同時還會作爲元數據發佈關聯的服務規範。

sentences.english: Empowering yourself, in general, is one of the best strategies for building self-confidence.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，讓自己更強大是建立自信的最好方式。

sentences.english: Empowering yourself, in general, is one of the prime strategies for building self-confidence.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，讓本人更強大是建立自信的最好辦法。

sentences.english: Generally,it's not appropriate to give your boss a gift.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，給上司送禮物是不合適的。

sentences.english: In general, it is based on the level of contribution and harm you make to the society.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講是社會的貢獻度與危害值來決定的。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, the English level of a homeschooler should be above Senior middle school or CET-4.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，自學者基礎需達到高中以上或四級水平。

sentences.english: You will usually find wooden spatulas only at stores specializing in French imports.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，你只能在賣法國進口貨的商店裏找到木鏟。

sentences.english: The input message, general in nature, may contain any type of information.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，輸入消息可能包含任何類型的信息。

sentences.english: On average, I make 1, 000 RMB ($150) per month in total.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，俺每個月一共能賺1000塊錢。

sentences.english: Generally the higher fitting degree, for earthquake location determining more accurate.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講擬合度越高，對於發震地點的確定就越準確。

sentences.english: In general, this turns out to be easier than you might think.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，這比您想像的要容易些。

sentences.english: Generally, trees should be repotted in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，春天時應該把灌木移栽一下。

sentences.english: 'Generally, it's not appropriate to give your boss a gift,' says Ms. Post.
sentences.chinese: 波斯特說，一般來講，給老闆送禮物是不合適的。

sentences.english: 841 1 Generally speaking, a contract cannot be changed after it has been signed by both parties.
sentences.chinese: 一般來講，合同一經雙方簽訂就不得更改。
